titles.title: To amend the Generalized System of Preferences program to include unwrought titanium among the list of articles that may not be designated as eligible articles.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 6/24/1998--Introduced. Amends the Trade Act of 1974 to include unwrought titanium as an import-sensitive article that may not be designated as an eligible article under the Generalized System of Preferences.
